name: Gyno Tales - Season 1
description:
Gyno Tales is a short adult Visual Novel in wich you take control of a young guy whose life is turned upside down when he accidentally finds himself in a gynecological clinic.

Have you always wanted to know all the female secrets? Dive into the extraordinary world of feminine charms with Gyno Tales!

Visual Novel Description
There are a lot of interesting things in life besides sex, but they are not interesting without it. I have always been a loser in relationships. I could never find a girl who understood and loved me. I hoped that I would get to know each other in college, that my perfect woman would one day show up and save me from loneliness. But a couple of months ago, I graduated college. And I'm still alone.

Working as an IT guy in a small firm, my boss invited me over one day and asked me to go to the women's health clinic his wife attends to set up some computers. I could not have imagined that on the very first day of work, something would happen to me that would radically change my whole life...

Features

- HD renders
- Intriguing story
- Explicit scenes
- The story is based on real life
- Can be played with one hand
- Steam achievements
